inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Dagger', 'Damage', 15); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Short Sword', 'Damage', 15); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Advanced Training, Small Swords
description: You gain an additional +15 to damage with daggers and short swords.
